overview: Sven Nykvist, best known as Ingmar Bergman cinematographer, made this film as a tribute to his father who was a missionary in Kongo in the early 20th century. The story of his father Gustav Natanael Nykvist is told through his own photos, letters, and films.  Director & cinematographer: Sven Nykvist.  Narrators: Liv Ullmann & Sean Connery  Produced by Ingmar Bergman (Cinematograph AB). Digitally restored in 2022.
tagline: Sven Nykvist's missionary father in Africa
title: The Vocation
